gradeDescription: A = I excelled at everything I did today!
noteworthyComments: I had a great time at Dayschool today!! We started off our day playing in the snow! It was so fun, afterwards we got to play with our friends followed by our training session. Today we worked on handling. I did great with my paws, ears and mouth being handled. Later we went out for another potty break. We ended our day relaxing.
